```{r, message = F}
library(rio)
library(tidyverse)
data <- import("WVS_Cross-National_Wave_7_spss_v5_0.sav")
data <- data %>% select(Q46, Q262, Q273)
```

``` {r}

```
Vervolgens probeerde ik:

